game.name: Nothing Beyond This Point
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In the Void, everyone is alone, and you're no exception. Use your endless health as damage, create your own strategy with abilities and Sigils, and fight through corrupted entities in this top-down action Metroidvania. Don't be fooled - you're nobody's last hope.
